description: FRONT GARDEN: Trees in garden of 34B Radburn:T1 = Large Holly - Reduce overall crown by 1.5 - 2 metres back to suitable growth points, leaving secondary growth to form a more balanced crown.T2 = Large Prunus - Reduce overall crown by 1.5 - 2 metres back to suitable growth points, leaving secondary growth to form a more balanced crown. Trees adjacent to 72 Bunbury Road identified as GRP1:GRP1 = 10 x Prunus 2 x Limes - Fell as close as possible to ground level. Trees in garden 71B Radbourne Road :T1 = Large Palm - Fell as close as possible to ground level.Trees located on Telford Scot Road: T1 = Large Malus (Outside 17a) - Reduce crown overall by 1.5 metres back to suitable growth point leaving secondary growth to form a more balanced crown. T2 = Large Malus (Outside 19a) - Reduce crown overall by 1.5 metres back to suitable growth point leaving secondary growth to form a more balanced crownT3 = Medium Malus (Outside 23a) - Reduce crown overall by 0.5 metres back to suitable growth points leaving secondary growth to form a more balanced crown. T4 = Large Malus (Outside 33a) -  Reduce crown overall by 1.5 metres back to suitable growth points leaving secondary growth to form a more balanced crownT5 = Large Malus (Outside 35a)  - Reduce crown overall by 1.5 metres back to suitable growth points leaving secondary growth to form a more balanced crownT6 = Medium Malus (Outside 41a) -  - Reduce crown overall by 1.5 metres back to suitable growth points leaving secondary growth to form a more balanced crownT7 = Medium Malus (Outside 43a) -  - Reduce crown overall by 1.5 metres back to suitable growth points leaving secondary growth to form a more balanced crown
